A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
The Last Jedi is beautiful to look at and listen to\, the cinematics and sound are amazing. However\, the plot is horrible\, the characters are uninteresting and/or annoying\, and the whole thing is infused with SJW nonsense.

Rey is a Mary Sue\, Kylo Ren comes across as whiny and not even a little intimidating\, and much of the rest of the characters seem to have been included to check boxes rather than tell an interesting or exciting story. Worst of all\, Luke Skywalker acts in a way that runs completely contrary to his character in the original trilogy\, and the change is a horrible one.

There are numerous internal consistencies and contradictions\, and physics errors that are not even excusable in fantasy and sci-fi. A ship requires no fuel to move forward in space\, only to accelerate (change speed or direction) to make course adjustments.

I don't know if it is possible\, but hopefully they replace both Kathleen Kennedy and Rian Johnson and replace them with people who care about the Star Wars story and universe and are able to somehow make up for this horrible movie with the sequel.
